Types of personal relationships between two living subjects.  Example:
Parent, sibling, unrelated friend, neighbor
name: PersonalRelationshipRoleType

text.div:
PersonalRelationshipRoleType

Types of personal relationships between two living subjects. Example: Parent, sibling, unrelated friend, neighbor

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include codes from http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/RoleCode where concept is-a _PersonalRelationshipRoleType
  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/RoleCode
